# cockroach-extra_cluster_setting (Resource)

Cluster setting

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "cockroach-extra_cluster_setting" "set_issuers" {
  cluster_id    = "29fd13f0-32a0-42e6-bf51-e7c3c5bbd03e"
  setting_name  = "server.jwt_authentication.issuers"
  setting_value = "other"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `cluster_id` (String) Cluster ID
- `setting_name` (String) Setting name
- `setting_value` (String) Setting value

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Cluster setting ID
